main event: A bright light was observed in the sky, hovering and/or stationary.
interesting points: The light was of a bluish-white color and appeared to pulsate at times.
The object seemed to be quite large in size, much larger than a conventional aircraft.
The object was observed for a total of approximately 10-15 minutes before it accelerated at a high rate of speed and disappeared from view.
There were no sounds associated with the object.
The object appeared to be solid and sharply outlined.
sighted object: a large, bright object emitting a pulsating glow
